content:

This portable speaker delivers incredible 360-degree sound, allowing you to enjoy your favorite music from any angle. Plus, it features a waterproof design, making it perfect for outdoor adventures, pool parties, or simply relaxing at home without worrying about spills!

Right now, it's priced at just **$89.99**, and there's a limited-time discount of **$30**, making it an even more enticing deal!

Thank you, Annabelle! Now, could you please provide your phone number so we can finalize your purchase?
Yes. Zero one seven seven two eight zero zero two five zero.

content:
Great! Thank you, Annabelle! Your purchase of the Bluetooth Speaker is all set. You'll receive a call shortly at **017772800250** to complete the process.

If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a fantastic day and enjoy your new speaker! Goodbye!
